page.title: 07NEW HOUSING IN CHINGFORD
page.content: {POSITION}Larkswood Estate;off New Rd; adjoining Chingford Hospital. Began in Autumn/1983.Finished 1985. {Flats:}62 one-bedroomed {mostly {Houses:}18 three-bedroomed {terraced 119 two-bedroomed {a few semi-} {detatched Prices from Â£34,995.Gardens back and front.Old people's sheltered housing nearly finished.Site developed by Waltham Forest Council and private building firm.On bus routes to overground/underground stations and main shopping centres. {DESIGN}low rooves covered with pan- tiles.Walls brick,pre-cast concrete and weather boarding.Fitted carpets + gas central heating.KITCHEN8'4"*8', fitted stainless steel units.LOUNGE 15'6"*13'.BEDROOM13'*9'*7".BATHROOM Coloured panel bath,wash basin and toilet.
